The distribution to be approximated

\[x \sim \pi*N(\mu_1, \sigma_1) + (1-\pi) * N(\mu_2, \sigma_2)\]

Bases: distributions.distribution

logpdf(samples)[source]¶

Returns the logpdf of the mixture of gaussians.

\[log(\pi*N(x|\mu_1, \sigma_1)+(1-\pi)*N(x|\mu_2, \sigma_2)) =\ log(\pi) + log(N(x|\mu_1, \sigma_1)) + \ log(1 + ((1-\pi)/\pi) * (\sigma2 / \sigma_1) * \ \exp(0.5 * ( \ ((x-\mu_2)/\sigma_2)^2 - ((x-\mu_1)/\sigma_1)^2 \ )) \ )\]
